channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report E-2024110318
item.description:
Report E-2024110318

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-18T12:24:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-01
  • City: RICHMOND
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While unloading freight from trailer material handler discovered a pail that was slightly leaking from the lid. Apparently other freight had been staged on top of the pail and as a result the pail was crushed slightly popping the lid and contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as was the crushed pail.
